articles.description: The women's world No.1 announced on Wednesday she'd be pulling the plug on her incredible career, six months after claiming the Wimbledon title last year.
articles.content:
Ash Barty has shut down a persistent reporter trying to get the bottom of the reason behind the tennis champion's shock retirement.

articles.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang left Toni Kroos needing stitches after extraordinary bust-up - The Mirror
articles.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang helped Barcelona record a famous victory in his first Clasico, but the striker's bad blood with Real Madrid man Toni Kroos was revived at the Bernabeu
articles.content:
Real Madrid midfielder Toni Kroos has revealed Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang left him needing stitches after a tackle in Sunday's El Clasico.
 The former Arsenal striker scored twice and added an assist… [+2550 chars]

articles.title: Manchester City rout Everton in WSL to move level with United in third - The Guardian
articles.description: Manchester City moved level on points with third-placed Manchester United after repeating their FA Cup win over Everton
articles.content:
Manchester City moved level on points with third-placed Manchester United after a 4-0 Womens Super League victory against Everton.
City, who knocked Everton out of the FA Cup 4-0 on Sunday, repeated… [+1018 chars]
